message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.ontology.core.api.ontologies.ontologyeditor.OntologyRecord' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.ontology.core.api.record.AbstractOntologyRecordService'.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.ontology.core.api.ontologies.ontologyeditor.OntologyRecordFactory' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.ontology.core.api.record.AbstractOntologyRecordService'.
'{' at column 59 should have line break after.
'}' at column 99 should be alone on a line.
